long_description: An essential tool for serious climbers, the Metolius GripSaver Plus(TM) Hand Strengthener was designed by a doctor to strengthen and balance the muscles of the hand, wrist and forearm. Super effective for rehab or prevention of climbing-related finger, wrist and elbow injuries. Exercises the hand through a full, natural range of motion. Metolius GripSaver Plus(TM) includes step-by-step instructions.
short_description: An essential tool for serious climbers, the Metolius GripSaver Plus(TM) Hand Strengthener was designed by a doctor to strengthen and balance the muscles of the hand, wrist and forearm.
